data.name: Town Diner
data.detailed_description:
Early Beta Access


About the Game


Town Diner is a world where you can farm organic products in farm life.You can buy farms for livestock, feed and grow them. If it is difficult to commute to your farm and town, you can buy a vehicle for yourself. To open your dream restaurant, you can enter agriculture and livestock jobs and earn money and open your restaurant.


When you open your restaurant, prepare meals with vegetables, eggs, milk, etc., serve customers and earn money.Gasoline will be very expensive when making shipments and you can drill an oil well for this, it will be very beneficial for you financially.If you can't keep up with agricultural work, you can find people in your town who can help you, but you must pay their salaries regularly.



You can buy new clothes and decide how it will look in town. You can work at night, of course, but this will tire you out and you may have difficulties during the daytime.

data.short_description: To open a restaurant with Town Diner, first grow organic vegetables. Buy the seeds of the vegetables needed for the restaurant, plant them, grow them and focus on growing by building a restaurant!
